text.title: Have Clothes Custom Made in Hong Kong

p.s: Custom clothes have been a traditional souvenir of visiting China since Hong Kong belonged to China the first time .

If you have clothes custom made in Hong Kong , you ca n't expect the deeply discounted prices you 'll find on the mainland , but you can come home with an exquisite suit or dress made with fine fabrics and cut exactly to fit your form .

list.item:
Create some preliminary ideas or sketches before you even leave your country of origin .
When getting clothes custom made in Hong Kong you should be prepared .
You 're very likely to spend much more than you budgeted for , and be less happy with the final result if you go without a plan or idea .
It can be a good idea to make your custom clothes part of your travel budget .
You 'll spend several hundred U.S. dollars on a quality Hong Kong tailor .

item.s: Talk to several tailors by phone or contact them via email to get an idea of their availability and prices .
The best tailors wo n't be available on a drop-in basis , so you can make an appointment as your travel plans are arranged .

figure.rend: Have Clothes Custom Made in Hong Kong Step 2 Version 2.jpg

item.s: You can find information about tailors in Hong Kong from recently-updated guidebooks for the city .
Another technique is to contact the hotel where you 'll be staying .
With tailored clothing being such a draw in Hong Kong tourism , the concierge is almost guaranteed to have a relationship with at least one tailor .
Visit the tailors you 're considering early during your stay in Hong Kong .
View fabric samples , talk about pricing and look at finished garments before committing to one tailor .
It 's best to set aside at least half a day for this research .

figure.rend: Have Clothes Custom Made in Hong Kong Step 3 Version 2.jpg

item.s: Set aside another half day for your fitting and initial negotiation with your tailor .
Bring sketches or photos from fashion magazines to help communicate exactly the kind of garment you want .

figure.rend: Have Clothes Custom Made in Hong Kong Step 4 Version 2.jpg

item.s: If you have a favorite suit , dress or other set of clothing , you can bring it to the tailor , and he will produce additional copies in different fabrics and colors .
Expect to pay a 50 percent deposit before your tailor will begin work .
Prior to paying that deposit , get a written agreement on price and due date .
Quality tailoring takes from several days to 1 week , so it 's best to get to this stage early during your vacation in Hong Kong .

figure.rend: Have Clothes Custom Made in Hong Kong Step 5 Version 2.jpg

item.s: Pick up your garment on the due date .
Check quality before you pay , and negotiate for any needed alterations .

figure.rend: Have Clothes Custom Made in Hong Kong Step 6 Version 2.jpg

list.item:
Avoid tailors who offer package deals .
The best tailors will make your clothing exactly to order , without adding extra garments .
Establishments with those package deals work to templates , trusting the fact that the tourist market does n't represent many return customers .

item.s: Burlington Arcade on Nathan Road is famous for its wide selection of quality and reasonably-priced tailors .
